If any of you have problems watching HD mp4 or mkv files such as this one. 
And you already tried VLC media player then:
Download and install K-Lite Codec pack (Mega)
http://www.codecguide.com/download_k-lite_codec_pack_mega.htm
It includes media player classic which is very light on cpu power.
If you have Win 7 make sure you enable the DivX H.264 decoder.
After install under tools folder open Win7DSFilterTweaker.
Change decoders from 'microsoft' default option.
That's the key to playing back HD videos.

Excuse my english!!

Hi,
I downloaded 3 samples and watched them on my tv and all 3 had some noticable artifacting in the backgrounds, where a square inch of the screen here and there did not change to the correct color, turned black, etc.
Not that I am complaining, but do the full episodes contain similiar artifacting as the samples did ?
Other than that, just amazing quality.
Just wondering as I may get a different file if this is the case.
Thanks.
Jeffiano

Hi,
UPDATE:
I finished downloading the first two episodes, and they both have lots of artifacts in the background as the samples do also.
Quality is 6/10 maybe.
I won't be downloading this file.
Why couldn't anybody else tell me this, instead of "perfect quality" comments by a few people, as it would have saved me a few days to discover this on my own.
And FYI this was not reencoded, but directly copied onto a usb stick and played back on a blu ray player and a 58 " tv with no file conversion, so it is impossible that somebody else is showing perfect quality on this file, unless they are watching it on a computer with a small screen possibly.
Thanks anyways.
Jeffiano
